thread.title: Detroit Artist N.I.C. Releases New Single "Down and Bad"
thread.title_full: Detroit Artist N.I.C. Releases New Single "Down and Bad" - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Detroit Artist N.I.C. Releases New Single "Down and Bad"
text:
Coast 2 Coast Mixtapes announces the release of new single by N.I.C. currently seeking blog placements and interviews.
Detroit, MI (PRWEB) September 30, 2015
Today Coast 2 Coast Mixtapes announces the release of "Down and Bad‚Äù, the latest single by Detroit's N.I.C. featuring Vai.
N.I.C. is currently seeking press opportunities, interviews, features, and more. He can be reached at through his official Twitter page .
About N.I.C.: Zerdine Nicholas Hagar Jr. (aka Nico or N.I.C) was born and raised on the east side of inner city Detroit, MI. Originally of African and Native American descent, Hagar is currently a tribal member of the Grand Traverse Band Of Ottawa & Chippewa Indians. Nico resided in Detroit until the age of 14 where he pursued more of an education in the beautiful surroundings of Traverse City, MI. After graduating high school with a hunger for music, Nico attended Western Michigan University and Lansing Community College for the next two years. After experiencing a couple years in college, with releasing multiple songs gaining attention, N.I.C released his first official project in March of 2015, "Double Major Vol.1", with his first single, "Down And Bad". The EP reflected his experiences in college and gained success. Shortly after, N.I.C returns back to Detroit to continue all of his work in music and has unofficially announced the title of next project, "Nico Suave", with no official date yet. For more info on N.I.C. visit his official Facebook page .
About Coast 2 Coast Mixtapes:
Coast 2 Coast Mixtapes are the most widely distributed mixtapes in the world, with over 100 million downloads/plays generated by over 300 volumes officially hosted by major artists. Coast 2 Coast has a solid reach in the new music industry with a digital magazine, DJ coalition, industry tips blog, yearly convention, and more. Coast 2 Coast Mixtapes represents a unique opportunity for artists of all urban genres, from major to indie. For more information, visit http://www.coast2coastmixtapes.com .
